definitions: A major state-owned enterprise in China, primarily involved in the generation and distribution of electricity.
A former Chinese power generation company that was one of the five largest state-owned power producers in China before its merger.
examples: Guodian Power Utilities played a significant role in China's energy sector.
The merger impacted Guodian Power Utilities' market position.
Investors monitored Guodian Power Utilities' performance closely.
